name: Jam It (Klipsgoboom, Sandoskan)
description:
The team name is Jam! Jam! Jam!
You need keyboard and mouse to play this game.
I'm serious

"Hello, [EMPLOYEE NAME].
Today you are lucky to get a job that not everyone can get. Your task for the rest of the time is to hire all sorts of incomprehensible people and force them to make sweet sweet jam. But do not think that they will be like robots, the same and without risks. They also have feelings (unbelievable): both positive (likes to crunch) and negative (happens to bund over a cup of coffee). Someone is good at writing papers, someone quickly conveys information, another can be a leader and drag all the staff at breakneck speeds. But do not forget that there are people who are good and sit in the toilet for 300 hours. In short, you need to accept people who will work well with each other and support each other, as in a chemical reaction. But keep in mind, if you accept some kind of morons, then WE WILL FIRE YOU THE CRAP
OUT OF YOU

UNDERSTAND?
Good.
WORK AND JOB, employee."

This game is a game where you must collaborate with your employees and create a successful business. It is impossible to win without creating a supporting community ;)

3 people worked on this game. Sandoskan#1745, Klipsgoboom#6961 and NUGGet3562#9656.

Assets from:

Start button from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

Money sign also from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

blank black button also from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

blank white button also from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

white check mark also from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

start button also from https://www.kenney.nl/ (under public cc0 domain)

the rest assets were made from scratch.
